entry.title: Coming to view that simplest way to outperform is: 1) buy crypto when bitcoin realized price is below market price 2) wait / do nothing 3) sell when b...
entry.summary:
Coming to view that simplest way to outperform is: 1) buy crypto when bitcoin realized price is below market price 2) wait / do nothing 3) sell when bitcoin is trading >3x it’s realized price 4) come back when bitcoin realized price is below market price 5) repeat
Surfer: Another thing that stands out is how much more battle hardened the bitcoin holder base is vs the eth holder base which is much more paper handed. Realized price drawdown this bear for btc was 20% vs 50% for eth.

entry.title: Damn… this really puts the debasement / robbery of the working class into context.
entry.summary:
Damn… this really puts the debasement / robbery of the working class into context.
Lyn Alden: Since the start of 2020, the United States has taken on $10.7 trillion in new public debt (i.e. accumulated deficits). That's about $80k per household in four years. Has your household received that much in deficit spending? Some did, but likely not yours.

entry.title: Re 用户可以通过请求矿池或矿工将其包含在区块中，来使得有效但非标准的交易进入区块。因为它是有效的，其他节点也会接受它。对于 op_return，标准限制还是 80 ...
entry.summary: Re 用户可以通过请求矿池或矿工将其包含在区块中，来使得有效但非标准的交易进入区块。因为它是有效的，其他节点也会接受它。对于 op_return，标准限制还是 80 字节，但有效限制可以更大。总的来说，他似乎对铭文这类交易不是绝对否定的态度，而是认为将其定义为有效交易并对数据存储可选化。

entry.title: Re 超过 80 字节但也被矿工纳入区块的那就是 IsValid() 了。不过，他认为如果能有一个小于 1kB 的数据存储区在隔离见证（segwit）附录中用于协调数据（这些数据...
entry.summary: Re 超过 80 字节但也被矿工纳入区块的那就是 IsValid() 了。不过，他认为如果能有一个小于 1kB 的数据存储区在隔离见证（segwit）附录中用于协调数据（这些数据并非共识的一部分），那将会非常有用和方便，这样的数据可以被存储和转发中继，并且作为节点上的一个可选功能持久化。

entry.title: 吴说获悉，针对近期铭文的争议，BlockStream CEO Adam Back 表示：在比特币中有两种交易接纳标准，“IsStandard()”是节点会将交易中继并纳入区块，“IsValid()...

DeFi Educator: 1) BTC pumps >$40k 2) Sidelineoors now need to bet more to make it 3) traders who caught the pump take profit and roll them over into the altcoin casino 4) Money flows from BTC -> Alts = altseason 5) BTC+ETH dominance chart makes a lower low
